text_logic_form: Find the length of the line KL.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line KL.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line JK is x+7.
The length of the line JL is 4x-8.
The length of the line JK is equal to the length of the line JL.
The length of the line JK is equal to the length of the line KL.
The length of the line LK is equal to the length of the line JL.
